original_text: But the bad man on the other cross told him that he should be quiet. He said, ‘You should be more afraid of God. We will die here, as well as him.
korean_text: 하나는 그 사람을 꾸짖어 이르되 네가 동일한 정죄를 받고서도 하나님을 두려워하지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: But the bad man on the other cross told him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 십자가에 못 박힌 그 악인이 그에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: 'You should be more afraid of God
